name: Inhuman Episode 1 Demo
description:
Inhuman is an adventure, side scrolling platformer. This is our team's first game we have released, we hope you enjoy. This is episode 1 out of the currently planned 3, episode 1 takes place in a harbour in the year 2069, you play as a cyborg bounty hunter looking for his next target. Enjoy our game =) (Giving us feedback is appreciated as we want to develop and improve our games in the future)

Controls:

A, D - Left, Right

F - Grenade

W - Jump

Space - Shoot/Fire
